omnipotenceLabel.message: Habilita el filtratge addicional a tots els llocs web
omnipotenceLabel.description: Header for a ruleset section in 'Filter lists pane'

omnipotenceLegend.message: L'uBO Lite pot aplicar el filtratge estès a un lloc web determinat, només després que concediu permisos al complement per modificar les dades de forma explícita. Aquesta configuració us permet concedir permisos de filtratge estès a tots els llocs web alhora.

1pFormatHint.message: Un filtre per línia. Un filtre pot ser un nom d'amfitrió simple o un filtre compatible amb EasyList. Les línies amb el prefix ! seran ignorades.
1pFormatHint.description: Short information about how to create custom filters

whitelistPrompt.message: Les directives del lloc de confiança dicten en quines pàgines web s'ha de desactivar l'uBO Lite. Una entrada per línia.
whitelistPrompt.description: A concise description of the 'Trusted sites' pane.

whitelistExportFilename.description: The default filename to use for import/export purpose

aboutSourceCode.description: Link text to source code repo

aboutFilterLists.description: Link text to uBO's own filter lists repo

firstRunSectionLabel.description: The header text for the welcome message section

firstRunDescription.message: You have just installed uBO Lite. You can choose here the default filtering mode to use on all websites. By default, Basic mode is selected because it does not require the permission to read and change data. If you trust uBO Lite, you can give it broad permission to read and change data on all websites in order to enable more advanced filtering capabilities for all websites by default.
firstRunDescription.description: Descriptive text shown at first install time only

defaultFilteringModeSectionLabel.description: The header text for the default filtering mode section

defaultFilteringModeDescription.message: The default filtering mode will be overriden by per-website filtering modes. You can adjust the filtering mode on any given website according to whichever mode works best on that website. Each mode has its advantages and disadvantages.
defaultFilteringModeDescription.description: This describes the default filtering mode setting

basicFilteringModeDescription.message:
Basic network filtering from selected filter lists.

Does not require permission to read and change data on websites.

optimalFilteringModeDescription.message:
Advanced network filtering plus specific extended filtering from selected filter lists.

Requires broad permission to read and change data on all websites.

completeFilteringModeDescription.message:
Advanced network filtering plus specific and generic extended filtering from selected filter lists.

Requires broad permission to read and change data on all websites.

Generic extended filtering may cause higher webpage resources usage.

behaviorSectionLabel.description: The header text for the 'Behavior' section

autoReloadLabel.message: Automatically reload page when changing filtering mode
autoReloadLabel.description: Label for a checkbox in the options page
